page.title: 14NEW YORK AND MURTON VILLAGES
page.content: New York and Murton are in North Tyneside and are both small villages. Murton village does not even have any shops.It does have a riding school,a public house and a small football pitch.The houses are quite expensive and most of them are fairly new. New York village is the bigger of the two.There is a school called Murton Primary School.It was built in 1878. New York village has two public houses a working men's club and some small shop.There is a disco on Mondays and Fridays in the Youth Club for children. A small library,which is attached to the school,is open for one hour on a Friday evening.Both villages are very quiet place live in.
